pageProps.toc: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#btn","depth":2,"text":"按钮 "},{"url":"#btn-add","depth":3,"text":"添加按钮 "},{"url":"#btn-remove","depth":3,"text":"删除按钮 "},{"url":"#btns-group","depth":3,"text":"按钮分组 "},{"url":"#title","depth":2,"text":"标题 "},{"url":"#gap","depth":2,"text":"占位符 "},{"url":"#illus","depth":2,"text":"插图 "},{"url":"#item-label","depth":2,"text":"数据项标题 "},{"url":"#item-desc","depth":2,"text":"数据项描述 "},{"url":"#item-icon","depth":2,"text":"数据项图标 "},{"url":"#item-icon-circle","depth":3,"text":"圆形图标 "},{"url":"#item-value","depth":2,"text":"数据项值 "},{"url":"#items-group","depth":2,"text":"数据项分组 "},{"url":"#shapes-group","depth":2,"text":"图形分组 "}]
pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic 导出了以下组件，便于规范化设计，并保持信息图之间的一致性。在自定义",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design#structure","children":"结构"}],"和",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design#item","children":"数据项"}],"时，可以直接使用这些组件。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"import {
  BtnAdd,
  BtnRemove,
  BtnsGroup,
  Gap,
  Illus,
  ItemDesc,
  ItemIcon,
  ItemIconCircle,
  ItemLabel,
  ItemValue,
  ItemsGroup,
  ShapesGroup,
  Title,
} from '@antv/infographic';
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["组件内部会写入 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-indexes"}]," 等标识，渲染器与编辑器会据此完成数据绑定、风格化与交互。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"btn","children":"按钮 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["用于在编辑模式下新增或删除数据项。",["$r","code",null,{"children":"indexes: number[]"}]," 用于描述操作的目标数据路径（如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"[0]"}]," 表示第 0 条数据，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"[1, 2]"}]," 表示层级数据中的第 2 个子节点）。"]}],"
",["$r","Note",null,{"children":"非编辑状态下，渲染器会默认隐藏按钮"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"btn-add","children":"添加按钮 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"BtnAdd"}]," 被渲染为一个 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"20 × 20"}]," 的矩形（该矩形会被渲染器渲染为实际的按钮组件），",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="btn-add""}],"。传入常规 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Rect"}]," 属性可调整位置、尺寸与样式。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<BtnAdd indexes={[0]} x={120} y={40} width={24} height={24} rx={4} />
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"btn-remove","children":"删除按钮 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"BtnRemove"}]," 与 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"BtnAdd"}]," 用法一致，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="btn-remove""}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<BtnRemove indexes={[1]} x={120} y={80} />
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"btns-group","children":"按钮分组 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"BtnsGroup"}]," 是带有 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="btns-group""}]," 的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Group"}],"，默认宽高为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"0"}],"，用于统一组织多个按钮的位置，并不参与布局计算。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<BtnsGroup>
  <BtnAdd indexes={[0]} x={0} y={0} />
  <BtnRemove indexes={[0]} x={36} y={0} />
</BtnsGroup>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"title","children":"标题 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Title"}]," 负责渲染主标题与描述文案，使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"FlexLayout"}]," 垂直排列，自动计算整体高度。关键属性："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"title"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"desc"}],"：主标题与副标题文案（可选，二者都为空时返回 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"null"}],"）。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"alignHorizontal"}],"：水平对齐方式，默认为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"center"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"width"}],"：文本宽度，默认 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"720"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"descLineNumber"}],"：描述行数，控制自动高度。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"themeColors"}],"：必填，用于应用主题色（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"title"}]," 使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"colorPrimaryText"}],"，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"desc"}]," 使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"colorTextSecondary"}],"）。"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<Title
  x={40}
  y={24}
  width={640}
  alignHorizontal="left"
  title="市场概览"
  desc="自动换行并按照 descLineNumber 计算高度"
  descLineNumber={2}
  themeColors={themeColors}
/>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"gap","children":"占位符 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Gap"}]," 是一个不会渲染任何图形的占位组件，仅用于布局时制造空隙，例如在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"FlexLayout"}]," 中插入间距。必须直接写成 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<Gap />"}],"，注意不要先赋值给变量再使用。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<FlexLayout flexDirection="row" gap={12}>
  <ItemLabel indexes={[0]}>标题</ItemLabel>
  <Gap width={8} />
  <ItemValue indexes={[0]} value={32} />
</FlexLayout>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"illus","children":"插图 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["插图组件，将 SVG 区域替换为数据中的插图资源（图片或外部 SVG）。默认填充为浅灰色以提示位置。传入 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"indexes"}]," 时会标记为数据项的插图(",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="item-illus""}],")，否则视为全局插图(",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="illus""}],")。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<Illus x={40} y={20} width={200} height={120} rx={12} />
<Illus indexes={[1]} x={0} y={0} width={96} height={96} />
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item-label","children":"数据项标题 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["数据项标题文本，默认宽度 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"100"}],"，字号 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"18"}],"、加粗、行高 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"1.4"}],"，自动计算高度并写入 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="item-label""}],"。必须传入 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"indexes"}]," 以完成数据绑定。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<ItemLabel indexes={[index]} width={160} fill="#222">
  {datum.label}
</ItemLabel>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item-desc","children":"数据项描述 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["数据项描述文本，默认宽度 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"100"}],"，字号 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"14"}],"，字色 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"#666"}],"，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"wordWrap"}]," 开启。通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"lineNumber"}]," 控制最大行数（默认 2 行）并据此自动计算高度。未传入 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"children"}]," 时返回 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"null"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<ItemDesc indexes={[index]} width={220} lineNumber={3}>
  {datum.desc}
</ItemDesc>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item-icon","children":"数据项图标 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["方形图标占位，默认尺寸 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"32 × 32"}],"、浅灰填充，可通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"size"}]," 或 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"width/height"}]," 修改，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="item-icon""}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"item-icon-circle","children":"圆形图标 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"ItemIconCircle"}]," 额外提供圆形背景（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"fill"}],"）与内部方形图标背景色（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"colorBg"}],"，默认白色），默认整体尺寸为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"50"}],"。内部正方形尺寸约为外圈的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"90%"}],"，居中摆放。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<ItemIconCircle
  indexes={[index]}
  x={0}
  y={0}
  size={48}
  fill={themeColors.colorPrimary}
  colorBg="#fff8e6"
/>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item-value","children":"数据项值 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["数据项的数值文本，必填 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"value: number"}],"，可用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"formatter"}]," 控制展示格式（默认 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"String(value)"}],"）。默认字号 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"14"}],"、行高 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"1.4"}],"，自动计算高度，并写入 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-value"}]," 便于运行时取数。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<ItemValue
  indexes={[index]}
  value={datum.value}
  formatter={(v) => `${v}%`}
  fontSize={20}
  fontWeight="bold"
/>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"items-group","children":"数据项分组 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["基于 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Group"}]," 的容器，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="items-group""}],"，通常在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"structure"}]," 中用于统一放置 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Item"}]," 组件，配合布局算法计算整体尺寸。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"shapes-group","children":"图形分组 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"ShapesGroup"}]," 与 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Group"}]," 用法一致，但带有 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="shapes-group""}]," 标记，便于主题风格化批量作用于组内的几何形状。"]}]]}]]
pageProps.tocEn: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#btn","depth":2,"text":"Buttons "},{"url":"#btn-add","depth":3,"text":"Add Button "},{"url":"#btn-remove","depth":3,"text":"Remove Button "},{"url":"#btns-group","depth":3,"text":"Button Group "},{"url":"#title","depth":2,"text":"Title "},{"url":"#gap","depth":2,"text":"Gap "},{"url":"#illus","depth":2,"text":"Illustration "},{"url":"#item-label","depth":2,"text":"Item Label "},{"url":"#item-desc","depth":2,"text":"Item Description "},{"url":"#item-icon","depth":2,"text":"Item Icon "},{"url":"#item-icon-circle","depth":3,"text":"Circle Icon "},{"url":"#item-value","depth":2,"text":"Item Value "},{"url":"#items-group","depth":2,"text":"Items Group "},{"url":"#shapes-group","depth":2,"text":"Shapes Group "}]
pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic exports the following components to facilitate standardized design and maintain consistency across infographics. These components can be directly used when customizing ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design#structure","children":"structure"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design#item","children":"data items"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"import {
  BtnAdd,
  BtnRemove,
  BtnsGroup,
  Gap,
  Illus,
  ItemDesc,
  ItemIcon,
  ItemIconCircle,
  ItemLabel,
  ItemValue,
  ItemsGroup,
  ShapesGroup,
  Title,
} from '@antv/infographic';
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Internally, components write identifiers like ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type"}]," and ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-indexes"}],", which the renderer and editor use for data binding, styling, and interaction."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"btn","children":"Buttons "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Used to add or remove data items in edit mode. ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"indexes: number[]"}]," describes the target data path for the operation (e.g., ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"[0]"}]," represents the 0th data item, ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"[1, 2]"}]," represents the 2nd child node in hierarchical data)."]}],"
",["$r","Note",null,{"children":"In non-edit mode, the renderer will hide buttons by default"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"btn-add","children":"Add Button "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"BtnAdd"}]," is rendered as a ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"20 × 20"}]," rectangle (this rectangle will be rendered as an actual button component by the renderer), with ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="btn-add""}],". You can pass regular ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Rect"}]," attributes to adjust position, size, and style."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<BtnAdd indexes={[0]} x={120} y={40} width={24} height={24} rx={4} />
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"btn-remove","children":"Remove Button "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"BtnRemove"}]," is used the same way as ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"BtnAdd"}],", with ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="btn-remove""}],"."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<BtnRemove indexes={[1]} x={120} y={80} />
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"btns-group","children":"Button Group "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"BtnsGroup"}]," is a ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Group"}]," with ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="btns-group""}],", with default width and height of ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"0"}],", used to uniformly organize the position of multiple buttons without participating in layout calculations."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<BtnsGroup>
  <BtnAdd indexes={[0]} x={0} y={0} />
  <BtnRemove indexes={[0]} x={36} y={0} />
</BtnsGroup>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"title","children":"Title "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Title"}]," is responsible for rendering the main title and description text, using ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"FlexLayout"}]," for vertical arrangement and automatically calculating the overall height. Key properties:"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"title"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"desc"}],": Main title and subtitle text (optional, returns ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"null"}]," when both are empty)."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"alignHorizontal"}],": Horizontal alignment, defaults to ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"center"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"width"}],": Text width, defaults to ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"720"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"descLineNumber"}],": Number of description lines, controls automatic height."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"themeColors"}],": Required, used to apply theme colors (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"title"}]," uses ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"colorPrimaryText"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"desc"}]," uses ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"colorTextSecondary"}],")."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<Title
  x={40}
  y={24}
  width={640}
  alignHorizontal="left"
  title="Market Overview"
  desc="Auto-wrap and calculate height according to descLineNumber"
  descLineNumber={2}
  themeColors={themeColors}
/>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"gap","children":"Gap "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Gap"}]," is a placeholder component that doesn’t render any graphics, used only for creating spacing in layouts, such as inserting gaps in ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"FlexLayout"}],". It must be written directly as ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<Gap />"}],", and should not be assigned to a variable before use."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<FlexLayout flexDirection="row" gap={12}>
  <ItemLabel indexes={[0]}>Title</ItemLabel>
  <Gap width={8} />
  <ItemValue indexes={[0]} value={32} />
</FlexLayout>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"illus","children":"Illustration "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Illustration component that replaces an SVG area with illustration resources from data (image or external SVG). Defaults to light gray fill to indicate position. When ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"indexes"}]," is passed, it’s marked as an item illustration (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="item-illus""}],"), otherwise treated as a global illustration (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="illus""}],")."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<Illus x={40} y={20} width={200} height={120} rx={12} />
<Illus indexes={[1]} x={0} y={0} width={96} height={96} />
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item-label","children":"Item Label "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Data item label text, with default width ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"100"}],", font size ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"18"}],", bold, line height ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"1.4"}],", automatically calculates height and writes ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="item-label""}],". Must pass ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"indexes"}]," for data binding."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<ItemLabel indexes={[index]} width={160} fill="#222">
  {datum.label}
</ItemLabel>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item-desc","children":"Item Description "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Data item description text, with default width ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"100"}],", font size ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"14"}],", text color ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"#666"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"wordWrap"}]," enabled. Controls maximum lines through ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"lineNumber"}]," (defaults to 2 lines) and automatically calculates height accordingly. Returns ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"null"}]," when ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"children"}]," is not passed."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<ItemDesc indexes={[index]} width={220} lineNumber={3}>
  {datum.desc}
</ItemDesc>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item-icon","children":"Item Icon "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Square icon placeholder, with default size ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"32 × 32"}]," and light gray fill, can be modified through ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"size"}]," or ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"width/height"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-element-type="item-icon""}],"."]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"item-icon-circle","children":"Circle Icon "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"ItemIconCircle"}]," additionally provides a circular background (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"fill"}],") and an internal square icon background color (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"colorBg"}],", defaults to white), with a default overall size of ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"50"}],". The internal square size is approximately ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"90%"}]," of the outer circle, centered."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<ItemIconCircle
  indexes={[index]}
  x={0}
  y={0}
  size={48}
  fill={themeColors.colorPrimary}
  colorBg="#fff8e6"
/>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item-value","children":"Item Value "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Numeric text for data items, requires ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"value: number"}],", can use ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"formatter"}]," to control display format (defaults to ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"String(value)"}],"). Default font size ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"14"}],", line height ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"1.4"}],", automatically calculates height, and writes ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data-value"}]," for runtime data retrieval."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-tsx","children":"<ItemValue
  indexes={[index]}
  value={datum.value}
  formatter={(v) => `${v}%`}
  fontSize={20}
  fontWeight="bold"
/>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"items-group","children":"Items Group "}],"
